ModMetaData.name: Packs Are Not Belts
ModMetaData.author: Turnovus
ModMetaData.description:
Moves the jump pack, low-shield, and some modded packs to the torso slot so they can be worn with belts.
Also moves some items to custom apparel layers, providing a wide array of loadout options.
Please check the mod options to configure, not all functionality is active by default.
